segments.text: Do you want to buy a sweater ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Which one is the latest ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The cowl-neck pullovers are new in . It sells like hot cakes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's my style . Will it be resistance to balling ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . The brand is Bird and it's famous for its quality .
segments.speaker: S1
